isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE / 5000 9100 9200 9400 9900 MODELS BUILT OCTOBER 1, 1998 AND AFTER - GAUGES AND WARNING LIGHTS - 5000, 5000i, 9000, 9000i - DIAGNOSTICS - ELECTRONIC SERVICE TOOL (EST) DIAGNOSTICS

svcproc.title: ELECTRONIC SERVICE TOOL (EST) DIAGNOSTICS
svcproc.para: Operation and accuracy of the speedometer, tachometer, fuel, oil pressure, water temperature and voltmeter can be verified with an EST, without removing the cluster. The EZ-Tech with the instrument cluster software the Pro-Link 9000 with the instrument panel cluster (IPC) cartridge can be used to exercise the speedometer/tachometer, through the J1708 data link . Refer to the EZ-Tech instrument cluster software manual or the Pro-Link (IPC) cartridge manual for instructions.
